value.0: I have nothing to say to you !
I think i did it !
Don't you know ? the City of Ureh is reborn ! now the war can come to a end ...

I am sorry <FullName>, but i did not tell you the whole truth when we where at the ruins of Ureh i did not know if i could trust you. I am on a quest that has to do with the war against the zealous armies of westmarch, in those times the young Prince Albrecht was gone missing one day, he is the child of King Leoric, Now that the Sanctuary is saved from evil, there is one more thing this world needs and that me friend is a King !

We believe that long ago when King Leoric was corrupted by Diablo, the young boy was taken by Horazon the Summoner, he was delighted in summoning demons and then breaking them to his will. Horazon, along with this brother Bartuc, were members of the eastern mage-clan known as the Vizjerei. This mystic clan studied the ways of demons and had cataloged their lore for generations. Empowered by this knowledge, Horazon was able to take the work of the Vizjerei and pervert it for his demented purposes. The denizens of Hell sought revenge against this bold mortal, but Horazon managed to keep himself well protected within his arcane sanctuary.

We the Vizjerei believe that his brother Bartuc, who was lured to the side of darkness has saved Horazon's soulstone and that both brothers are still in these realms somewhere ! For years and years we are hunting down these two to get ower work back that they stole. Somehow we got information that the two brothers where hiding in the Ruins of Ureh waiting for the City to reborn so that they could make a new headquarter to gain strength again to start a new War of Blood, using the young prince as cover for there deeds....

We must save the young boy and bring the two brothers to justice, but there is something else that i must tell you, the Crystal of Shadow holds a terrible secret, it is said that the crystal can summon the death and that it has the power of accumulate the death and thier soulstones.

I am sorry to tell you this, but dont worry they could not reach the Sanctuary yet they are concealed in their lair's so long the Crystal of Shadow is not destroyed so i will guard it here in the temple. We have to bring the boy back to the sanctuary only then we can live in peace with all the different aligments who live there, the new king can unite the aligments to one kingdom.

I believe that Horazon is going back to the place he started his war in the Arcane Sanctuary i don't know where Bartuc is making his plans against the World of Sanctuary but i guess he is not far from his brother.
Because the Three Brothers will be released from thier Lair's and united again, they will not tolerate Horazon and Bartuc and that would get them in a new War of Sin !
<FullName> go to the Arcane Sanctuary and stop Horazon, after you killed them bring his soulstone to me, in the meantime i will try to figure out where Bartuc is after.
We believe the boy is held in the catacombs of Viz-Jun we can not release him whitout the soulstones of the two brothers, now go !
Did you bring back the soulestone from Horazon ?

I don't know where Bartuc is hiding but if he was not in the Arcane Sanctuary maybe you should ask arround in towns to see if you can get some information about his stay, his presents will not be unnoticed by the people.

Kill him, and bring his soulstone to me ... i think i have the key to get into the catacombs of Viz-Jun, i believe it has something to do with the two soul stones and the Crystal of Shadow but i have not puzzle it out yet .... but i will stay here, in the meantime you can hunt Bartuc down....
Did you bring back the soulstone from Bartuc ?

I have not puzzle it out jet what to do with the soulstones, the next move will be to get the young Prince Albrecht out of his prison the only think i can tell you is that you must find the village of Viz-Jun. On the bank of the river Argentek you will find the ruines of a temple. The catacombs of the temple of Viz-Jun is the place where the young Prince Albrecht is been hold, please search for the village and ask the local people for the temple of Viz-Jun.

The road to Viz-Jun can be found in north of the Great Marsh forest in Kehjistan, search for the boy and bring him back to me. We the Vizjerei will take care of the boy and teach him everthing he has to know for his accession to the throne.
Welcome back, thank you for saving Prince Albracht.

Now for your final quest go down the catacombs of this temple to defeat the prime evils who are in there lairs waiting to come out...... beware.... you need the soulstone of the creature you want to defeat. Defeat them all to become the greatest hero in the history of the World of Sanctuary.
Welcome back Hero ! did you defeat all the evil creatures in the Tombs of Evil ?

I am impressed, Hero.... 
You have overcome one of the greatest challenges this world has ever faced. 
Go now, Hero... I have opened a portal that will lead you to Scosglen.
I will meet you in the encampment in the south of Scosglen to tell you more about your final quest.
What has happend ?
War ? what are you talking about ?
What has the reborn of Ureh to do with the missing child ?
But are you telling me that Horazon still leaves ?
And now what we do ?
What !!!! are you telling me that the other prime evils are summon again ?
Okay, but what are we going to do next ?
Why are Horazon and Bartuc not trying to destroy the Crystal of Shadow ?
Okay.
And the boy ?
Okay.
Yes.
Okay, but what if i find him ?
Okay.
Yes.
Could you please tell me where the village of Viz-Jun is ?
Okay.
No problem.
No.
Yes.
Thank you, Quov Tsin....
